<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">47d2bbc308c202107f448feca1e912ab</macroponent><name>heading_4/label</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  * @returns {number} total
  */
function evaluateProperties({api, helpers}) {

  var results = api.data.look_up_records_1.results;
  var total = 0;
  var n = results.length;

  for (var i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    total += (results[i].price.value * results[i].quantity.value);
  }

  api.setState('CartTotal', total);

  return total;
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adam.botens</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-16 19:24:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf72374cd19602107f4458555dba8c68</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>heading_4/label</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DropshipNow" source="x_cdltd_dropship_0">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DropshipNow">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_bf72374cd19602107f4458555dba8c68</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adam.botens</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-17 18:35:49</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
